00053 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00054 /** @defgroup SPI_LCD_Exported_Constants SPI LCD exported constants
00055   * @{
00056   */
00057 
00058 #define START_BYTE      0x70
00059 #define SET_INDEX       0x00
00060 #define READ_STATUS     0x01
00061 #define LCD_WRITE_REG   0x02
00062 #define LCD_READ_REG    0x03
00063 
00064 /**
00065   * @}
00066   */
00067 
00068 /* Exported macro ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00069 /** @defgroup SPI_Exported_Macros SPI LCD exported macro
00070   * @{
00071   */
00072 
00073 #if (LCD_SPI_SEL_GPIO_ENABLE == 1)
00074   #define LCD_SEL_CMD_INACTIVE()    GPIO_SetOutBits(GPIO_PORT[LCD_SPI_SEL_GPIO_ID], LCD_SPI_SEL_AFIO_PIN)
00075   #define LCD_SEL_CMD_ACTIVE()      GPIO_ClearOutBits(GPIO_PORT[LCD_SPI_SEL_GPIO_ID], LCD_SPI_SEL_AFIO_PIN)
00076 #else
00077   #define LCD_SEL_CMD_INACTIVE()    SPI_SoftwareSELCmd(LCD_SPI, SPI_SEL_INACTIVE)
00078   #define LCD_SEL_CMD_ACTIVE()      SPI_SoftwareSELCmd(LCD_SPI, SPI_SEL_ACTIVE)
00079 #endif
00080

00082   * @}
